description: Restaurant Style Tofu Butter Masala Recipe - Easy Indian Butter Tofu "Paneer". Dairy-free Tofu Paneer Butter Masala. Tofu is marinated and baked then simmered in tomato ginger cashew sauce. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe.
keywords: indian vegetarian butter sauce, restaurant style butter paneer, vegan butter chicken, vegan paneer butter masala
name: Butter Tofu Paneer - Restaurant Style Tofu Butter Masala Recipe
recipeIngredient: 12 oz firm tofu (pressed between paper towels for 10 minutes, then cubed)
1/2 tsp each of garam masala (,paprika, salt, and turmeric)
2 tsp garlic paste or minced (or 3/4 tsp garlic powder)
1.5 tbsp cornstarch ( or other starch such as arrowroot)
3 large ripe tomatoes (or 1 15 oz can diced tomatoes)
1 inch cube of ginger (1/2 inch chopped, 1/2 inch julienned or thinly sliced into sticks)
1 hot or mild green chile juilenned or thinly sliced (or use very thinly sliced green bell pepper)
Cashew cream made with with 1/4 cup soaked (15 mins cashews blended with 1/2 cup water)
1 tsp kasooori methi - dried fenugreek leaves
1/2 tsp sugar or other sweetener (to preference)

recipeInstructions.text: Press and cube the tofu if you havent already. In a bowl, mix the rest of the ingredients under baked tofu, to make a marinade. Add tofu and toss well. Let it sit for 15 min (optional). Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200oc. Place the tofu cubes on parchment lined sheet. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes.

video.description:
Easy Indian Butter Tofu “Paneer”. Dairy-free. So Good!
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2017/05/butter-tofu-paneer-tofu-butter-masala-recipe.html

Restaurant Style Tofu Paneer Butter Masala. Tofu is marinated and baked then simmered in tomato ginger cashew sauce. Vegan Butter Tofu. Gluten-free. Popular Indian Recipe. Can be made without Tofu, Use Soycurls, Chickpea tofu, vegan chicken subs or Kite hill Original Almond cheese(as a sub for paneer).
